description: Scalable Consulting-as-a-Service (CaaS) for Underserved Entrepreneurs & Small Teams
purpose: Democratize high-impact business consulting by giving overlooked founders and under-optimized small businesses a subscription-based toolkit—combining data analytics, guided playbooks, and on-demand expert support—that turns passion into profit without enterprise-level budgets.
vision: Become the trusted operating partner for every self-funded entrepreneur who needs systems, strategy, and accountability, delivering AI-powered insights and human expertise through a single friction-free experience.

target_users.needs: Step-by-step playbooks, affordable coaching, KPI visibility
Process automation, team task tracking, shared dashboards
Rapid business setup, compliance guidance, mindset coaching
Advanced analytics, funding prep, scalable SOPs

core_features.name: Diagnostic Wizard
core_features.description: Guided questionnaire imports financial & operational data, auto-generates baseline KPI dashboard & priority roadmap

core_features.name: Playbook Library
core_features.description: Modular SOPs (marketing, operations, finance) with task templates and progress tracking

core_features.name: Workflow Builder
core_features.description: No-code automations with Zapier/webhooks for external tool triggers

core_features.name: KPI Dashboards
core_features.description: Real-time metrics: revenue, conversion, cost per lead, burn rate with peer benchmarking

core_features.name: Expert Hub
core_features.description: Book on-demand sessions with vetted consultants, in-app messaging & Slack integration

core_features.name: Resource Marketplace
core_features.description: Templates, calculators, industry checklists with pay-as-you-go or tiered plans

core_features.name: AI Insight Engine
core_features.description: GPT-powered recommendations and natural-language query over client data warehouse

technical_requirements.frontend: Next.js 15 on Netlify with ISR; Tailwind UI
technical_requirements.serverless_functions: Supabase Edge Functions for webhooks & automations
technical_requirements.auth: Supabase Auth (email/OAuth) + SAML add-on for larger teams
technical_requirements.payments: Stripe Billing for tiered subscriptions & one-off products
technical_requirements.messaging: AWS SES for email; Slack API for community channels
technical_requirements.performance: p95 API responses < 250 ms under 5k concurrent users
technical_requirements.compliance: GDPR & CCPA ready; SOC 2 Type I target Q2-2027

year_1_goals: Reduce time-to-system implementation from 12 weeks → 4 weeks
Deliver 20% average revenue growth for engaged clients within six months
Reach 1,000 paid seats with < 2% monthly logo churn
key_metrics: Playbook adoption rate (plays run per client per month)
